BetterSearch Browser Extension  by D2r Internet Holdings,  is an exciting search experience powered by Tempest Search with Microsoft Bing search results.

The Better Search extension comes with a variety of features, enabling a better and safer search:  

*   Search without saving your history - Tempest Search takes private search to a whole new level. It starts with better results and ends with you staying anonymous every session.
 
*    Keep your data your property - While other search engines profit from your personal information, Tempest Search doesn’t monitor you or sell your data to third parties. The more you use Tempest Search, the more private your internet activity becomes.

*    Find results outside the bubble - Your results today are an echo chamber – shaped by tracking your every move. Tempest Search eliminates trackers and search history to ensure your results are objectively relevant and not tied to you or your past behavior.

*   Ads that won’t follow you around - With Tempest Search, flashy banners won’t sit shotgun in your online experience. Imagine an Internet where companies won’t retarget you – that’s what we’re creating. Access a cleaner search starting today.

** the Private Search will be powered by Tempest Search with Microsoft Bing search results.

** Please read carefully: by installing the Better Search extension, you agree to install this application, and you agree to the End User License Agreement and the Privacy Policy.

About Us: https://bettersear.ch
Privacy Policy: https://bettersear.ch/index.php/privacy-policy
End-User License Agreement: https://bettersear.ch/index.php/terms-of-use
